info.title: Face Recognition and Face Detection
info.description: Stephen here from Lambda Labs. For sample code and a graphical demo, check out http://api.lambdal.com/docs. Our API provides face recognition, face detection, eye position, nose position, mouth position, and gender classification. If you have any questions ask! Just send an email to s@lambdal.com. Happy Hacking! -Stephen

get.description: View one of your albums, with a visual summary.

parameters.name: album
parameters.description: The name of the album you want to view

parameters.name: albumkey
parameters.description: The album key of the album you want to view

post.description: Create a new photo album, be sure to save your albumkey!
Detect faces in an image, as well as extract facial features (eyes, nose, mouth)

get.description: Manually rebuild an album after adding training examples

parameters.name: album
parameters.description: The name of the album to rebuild

parameters.name: albumkey
parameters.description: The albumkey for the album to rebuild

post.description: After creating, training, and rebuilding an album (see above), you'll be able to recognize people in that album.

get.description: View an entry in an album, telling you how many training images it has

parameters.name: albumkey
parameters.description: The album key for the album

parameters.name: entryid
parameters.description: An entry id for the person you with to view

post.description: Add an image and entryid to an album
